sn54.6:1.4: Evam vutte, ayasma arittho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn54.6:1.6: “Yatha katham pana tvam, arittha, bhavesi anapanassatin”ti?
sn54.6:1.7: “Atitesu me, bhante, kamesu kamacchando pahino, anagatesu me kamesu kamacchando vigato, ajjhattabahiddha ca me dhammesu patighasanna suppativinita.
sn54.6:2.2: Api ca, arittha, yatha anapanassati vittharena paripunna hoti
sn54.6:2.3: tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn54.6:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma arittho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.6:3.2: Idha, arittha, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.6:3.6: Evam kho, arittha, anapanassati vittharena paripunna hoti”ti.
